name_for_human: AllergenFreeDog - Dog Food Allergy Detection Tool
description_for_model: AllergenFreeDog is a comprehensive web application that helps dog owners identify problematic ingredients by comparing triggering foods (foods that caused problems) with safe foods (foods that didn't cause issues). The tool provides ingredient analysis, allergen detection, and safe food testing capabilities.
description_for_human: A free online tool to compare dog food ingredients and detect potential allergens. Compare triggering vs safe foods to identify problematic ingredients and test new foods for safety.

apis.name: food_catalog
apis.description: Manage and retrieve food catalog information including sample foods and custom entries

apis.name: ingredients
apis.description: Handle ingredient operations, normalization, and retrieve master ingredient list

apis.name: compare
apis.description: Compare triggering and safe foods to identify non-similar ingredients

apis.name: safe_food_finder
apis.description: Test new foods against known problematic ingredients for safety assessment
